# circle

R client package for the Circle CI REST API

## What works

- [x] Get env vars
- [x] Delete env vars

- [x] Set ssh key
- [x] Get ssh key
- [x] Delete ssh key

- [x] Get pipelines
- [x] Get workflows
- [x] Get builds

- [x] Trigger build
- [x] Retry build
- [x] Enable a repo

# What doesn't work

- [ ] Set env vars

Inspired by the work of [Thomas J. Leeper](https://github.com/leeper) on the [cloudyr/circleci](https://github.com/cloudyr/circleci) package.
